message: Take this generous offer and we can call it a day!
A fair split, no need to negotiate further!
Not bad, but I think I can do better than a 50-50 split. Let's keep negotiating!
You're being too optimistic with your 'fair split' claim. Let's get real about the value of money!
I'm not backing down, Alice. You can do better than that!
You're still not getting the better deal you think you are, Bob. I'll pass on this one!
I'm not budging, Bob. You're starting to get desperate. Time to make a serious offer!
You're getting closer, Alice, but I'm not ready to settle yet. Let's keep negotiating!
You're getting greedy, Bob. I'll take a firmer stance: I want 60% of the remaining money!
You're running out of time, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'm not panicking, Alice. I'll keep pushing for a better deal!
You're getting desperate, Bob. I'm not backing down. I want 70% of the remaining money!
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving up yet, Alice. I'll keep pushing for a better deal!
You're really stretching it now, Bob. I want 80% of the remaining money. Take it or leave it!
This is my last serious offer, Bob. Take it and we can finally end this!
I'm not giving up, Alice. I'll take the risk and hope for a better outcome.
You're crazy, Bob! I'm not going to accept this ridiculously skewed offer. It's time to walk away and split the remaining crumbs.
